searchUrl:
<js>
cookie.removeCookie(source.getKey());
   (()=>{
  let base='https://m.txt8080.cc/e/search/';
  if(page==1){
    let url=base+'index.php';
    let body='show=title%2Csoftsay%2Csoftwriter&keyboard='+key+'&tbname=download&tempid=1&Submit22=%E6%90%9C%E7%B4%A2';
    return base+source.put('surl',java.post(url,body,{}).header("Location"));
  } else {
    return base+source.get('surl')+'&page='+(page-1);
  }
})()
Â </js>

iv=c.slice(0,16)

ruleContent.content:
<js>
try {

function d(a, b) {
b = java.md5Encode(b);
var d = b.substring(0, 16);
var e = b.substring(16);
return java.aesBase64DecodeToString(a,e,"AES/CBC/PKCS5Padding",d)
}

result=eval(src.match(/(d\("[\s\S]+"\))\);/)[1])
} catch(err) {

result=result
}

a=escape(result).replace(/%u200[ABDCEF]/g,"")
unescape(a)

</js>

ruleToc.chapterList:
<js>
temp=result
R=org.jsoup.Jsoup.parse(temp).select(".BCsectionTwo-top-chapter a")
c=[]
R.forEach(r=>{
	i=String(r.attr('href')).replace(/.+\/\d+\/(\d+)\.html/,`$1`)
	//java.log(i)
	c.push({
		name:r.text(),
		url:r.attr('href'),
		index:i
		})
	})
try{
	o=temp.match(/originalOrder[^=]*=[^\[]*\[([^\]]+)\]/)[1]
	o=o.split(",")
	c.sort((a,b)=>o[c.indexOf(a)]-o[c.indexOf(b)])
	}catch (err){
		java.log(err)
		c.sort((a,b)=>a.index-b.index)
		}
	result=c
</js>

function d(a, b){
	b = java.md5Encode(b)
	iv = b.substring(0, 16)
	key = b.substring(16)
	Cipher=java.createSymmetricCrypto("AES/CBC/PKCS7Padding" ,key,iv)
	return Cipher.decryptStr(a)}
eval(match[0])
</js>

ruleToc.chapterUrl:
<js>
sourceUrl='https://cooingc.cc/'
java.log(baseUrl)
let result = java.getElement('tag.button').toString();
const startIndex = result.indexOf("href='/");
const endIndex = result.indexOf("/'");
const endUrl = result.substring(startIndex+7, endIndex);
java.log(endUrl)
url=sourceUrl+endUrl+'/'
java.log(url)
</js>

ruleSearch.bookList:
<js>
list=JSON.parse(result).sources
Json=[]
for(i in list){
list1=JSON.parse(result).sources[i].details.data;
for(j in list1){
if(list1[j].title.indexOf(java.get('key'))>-1){
Json.push(list1[j])
}
}
}
result=JSON.stringify(Json)
</js>

ruleBookInfo.init:
<js>
var bookId=java.get('bid');
var encryptKey="37e81a9d8f02596e1b895d07c171d5c9",user_id="8000000",timestamp=parseInt((new Date).getTime()/1e3);
var o=bookId+timestamp+user_id+encryptKey;
var sign=java.md5Encode(o);
var list={'turl':'https://ocean.shuqireader.com/api/bcspub/qswebapi/book/chapterlist?_=&bookId='+bookId+'&user_id=8000000&sign='+sign+'&timestamp='+timestamp};list
</js>

ruleToc.nextTocUrl:
<js>
var a = 'https://anduril.xmkanshu.com/v3/book/get_last_chapter_list?bookid=@get:{book}&page=1&pagesize=100000&lastchapterid=';
var r = [];
for(var i=1;i<50;i++){
    r.push(a + parseInt(i*300));
}
r
</js>
